title: unadu padam
sahitya:
unadu padam piDittE ulavuginrEn inda ulaginil aruL annaiyE


anupallavi

  manadu kalangum pOdun mangalap-punnakai enadu tuyar vilakki ilagu varam taruvAi


caraNam    ettanai mATRangaL attanai EmATrangaL attanai EtrangaL attanai irakkangaL
ettanai innalgaL inda ulaginilE attanaikkum marundun anbu tarum inbamE
tUya nal vIrar tuNaiyE ammA tuNaiyena nambinEn unaiyE nin 
sEyenak-koNDAL enaiyE Om shrIm hrIm paradEvataiyE
